values: i forgot about this journal. Anyways I have some errands to run now be back later
The journal I mostly write in is Jill1780 for anyone that wants to add me:)
Hope everyone had a good Christmas . I did and before Christmas I got to go to NYC for the first time ever. It was so much fun.
I have not been on here in awhile.I have another journal that I'm on more if anyone wants it

I got all my errands done today

Now I'm just relaxing and waiting for my husband to get off work:)
Two days off in a row yesssssssss . Hoping to see a friend tomorrow when she gets off work

Heres a few quotes that I found that I liked

"A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out."


"A friend is someone who is there for you when he'd rather be anywhere else." 

A friend is a shoulder to lean on, an ear to listen, and a heart to comfort. 

"A friend is one who knows you as you are, understands where you've been, accepts who you've become, and still invites you to grow

I had a good day off after working eight days in a row. My husband bought me some cute shoes and Grey's Anatomy season one:) I know I have not been updating a lot but I'm still here.  I got 35hrs at work next week and I have 40hrs this week about time they started giving me normal hours:)
Rainy sunday and I have no engery my ear hurts and my sinus hurt:(

My husband bought me flowers today:) I saw them when I got home from work :) This weekend looks fun I am suppost to go to Boston with a friend on Friday then Saturday we are having friends over and my husband is going to cook us something:)

I got a new car 2005 Pontiac Grand Am ( I love it!!!!!!!!!!) I have better ones but they show my license plate. In other words I saw friends the last few days and its been fun. I have to work on the 4th but I'll be out in time to see the fire works:)

A friend from Fl is up now and we have been having fun. She is here for till after the 4th and then she comes back to live in the area the end of July:) I also met two new people that were nice and hopefully will hang out again. Always nice to meet new people.:)
I lost touch with my dad for almost 2 years now and I want to get in touch with him but I dont know how and I'm not close with any of the family on that side

Today my I worked till 10am and when I got home I went back to bed for awhile with my husband and we went to the mall and Barns and Noble and I got a yummy coffee drink and we watched movies just I good day:)
I got these from my husband yesterday:)

I had a nice relaxing day with my husband yesterday. We went out to eat at On the Border and then came home and watched movies. He also bought me two movies Red Eye and Memoirs of a Geisha which I have not watched yet. I'm going to try to get some cleaning done today:)
My weekend has been good got to see friends.  My husband starts his new job tomorrow and he seems happy now I just need to get a new job:) or eles spending has to be cut down a bit

My little brother turned 3 today:) He got a lot of cars and trucks since that is like his favorite thing and a new sandbox. I got a lot of reading done today, why you ask I was at Jury Duty all morning

I deal with enough rude people at work. I went over to get a few things across the street at Stop and Shop and I went through self check out and this lady kept tapping  impatiently and then I went to bag my stuff and I always wait for people to bag there stuff before I start she rudely say I want that divider so I can please start my order as if she was waiting forever or something. I deal with enough of this at work I don't need it on my time off and I didn't hold her up at all . How much of a rush does someone need to be at 8:00pm on a Sunday night. :(
I order a French Vanilla Iced Coffee and I got a regular iced coffee for some reason and for some reason I only like flavored coffee . They just taste better to me:)

I stopped writing in my other Live Journal cause I never get any comments. I was hoping maybe with a new set of friends on here,I might will see. I went into work to get my check and my manager was mean to me about my other job that has since ended. I was late one day last week and she said if you can't get here on time we will find someone to come in and cover. Take in mind I was working till midnight then coming in between 7:00am-8:00am and only one day I was ten minutes late. I don't think that is bad considering. I need a job were I can be recognized and where I don't get critcized for little things. All and all I think I've moved on from that job and being off for three weeks and coming back just makes me realize it more and I can also do a less stressful job and get paid more. I miss that my temp job ended. I liked being busy.  I liked making more money. I hate just sitting around. I like to be productive. I guess that's it for my rant thanks for anyone that listened.
I've been busy work two jobs but now that my temp job is over I have some more time to update. Thanks for anyone who still kept me as a friend on here. :) I think I'll post some pictures soon.:)
I know I havent updated in a while its because I forgot my password and had forgot what email I signed up with for it, but I got it back so all be updating more now
Today I got together with some friends and I was kinda talking bad about another friends of ours and now I feel bad. I don't think this friend would ever talk bad about me

I guess there are some people you connect and some you just can't make the connection. I don't know it just seems like there are only a few friends now that I really enjoy see and being with and it doesn't matter what we do and others are just not as fun to be with and is it really worth hanging out with them. I have friends that it doesn't seem like they care eirther way if I was there or not there.

Stolen from ljuser="vagynafondue">

I am issuing a challenge to each and every single person on my friends list.<lj-cut>
There are three things I want you to do in the coming days. They are simple things and will not cost you a lot of time, money or effort.


Donate $20 towards helping the Hurricane Katrina victims.

Give blood.

Spread the word in your Livejournals by linking to this post or posting your own request for YOUR FListers to do the same.

I know. I know. Money is tight right now for everyone. With rising gas prices, many of us are suffering a bit too. That said, look around you. If you woke up in a bed in your own home this morning, had food to eat, clothes to wear and a job to go to or the ability to find a job if necessary you have a thousand times more than the victims of Katrina!!!!

How could you not donate $20 and give blood to help out these people? 

You may donate your $20 any way you choose. You may make a donation through the American Red Cross, via Google and Amazon.com, The Network for Good or any local charity in your area that is collecting funds for Hurricane Katrina relief. Glenn Miller has put together a master list of charities and relief agencies that are accepting donations at this time. 

You may spend $20 to purchase the following needed items:


Toothbrushes and toothpaste

Cleaning supplies

Paper goods

Bottled water

Non-perishable food items

Diapers

Baby food

Contact your local radio station and local food bank to find out where you may drop off your $20 of goods for the hurricane victims. $20 is not a huge amount of money folks. If each and every single one of you on my friends list spent $20 in the next few days, we would send $2300 of needed items and/or food and water to the victims of Hurricane Katrina.

If you spread the word on your friends list, how much more could we accomplish?!?!

To find out where you can give blood, please visit the American Red Cross site. This link will take you directly to an area where you can find a blood drive in your area.

Naturally, if you can give more please do so. If you have clothes, stuffed animals, books, games, towels, ANYTHING that you have been meaning to truck off to Goodwill, please take it to the Salvation Army instead. They will donate all goods to the victims of the hurricane.

If you have any other ideas about how to help, please reply in comments and I will happily post it. Feel free to link to this post or create your own challenging folks to give JUST $20 and to DONATE BLOOD. Then ask them to pass it on.

Again, I know money is tight for everyone right now. But if ALL of us gives just $20, think of what we can accomplish for people who have nothing.</lj-cut>

I would have otherwise but it is out of my way.
